executable.title: Voxelize Tetrahedral Mesh
executable.description: Voxelize a tetrahedral mesh into a label map.

geometry.name: InputRestMesh
geometry.label: Input rest model
geometry.description: This is the tetrahedral mesh that has been posed

geometry.name: InputPosedMesh
geometry.label: Input posed model
geometry.description: This is the tetrahedral mesh that has been transformed. There must be a 1 to 1 match of points and cells with the input rest model

image.name: InputRestVolume
image.label: Input rest volume
image.description: This is the labelmap to pose.

image.name: OutputPosedVolume
image.label: Output posed volume
image.description: This is the posed labelmap. Its size is defined by the bounding box of the posed mesh and its resolution by the input labelmap.

double.name: Padding
double.label: Padding
double.description: This property controls the padding to apply around the tetmesh to define the output boundaries.

boolean.name: IsMeshInRAS
boolean.label: Tetmesh in RAS
boolean.description: Whether input meshes are already in the RAS(Right, Anterior, Superior) coordinate system (true) or in LPS (Left, Posterior, Superior) coordinate system (false, default). If not, the meshes will be internally transformed into RAS.
